question: Studies have shown that in many countries the income gap between the rich and poor is ever increasing.What problems can arise from this situation and what could be done to address this situation?
text: In recent reports published by experts, it is  observed that there is huge variance in income among the people in the community. The main reason for this is highly increasing  unemployment and market saturation. This essay will discuss the potential  complications, which may arise if the compensation gap is not overcome within the society, also it would discuss probable solutions to maintain the economic balance in the nation.

To begin with, the dilemma of the income gap will lead to  birth of criminal activities for earning a living. In addition, it will also result in physical and mental exploitation of the weaker and helpless people in society. Moreover, Children of the impoverished community would  be deprived of quality education, which will elevate illiteracy and will mitigate job opportunities.

Although, the issues are critical, the authorities can take some measures to overcome the economic gap by providing  various schemes which may  lead to employment among the  needy people in the community.  For example,  the Government can grant funds for  a new start up of  business at a low interest rate with long term  repayment option  to make them self independent. Scholarship, along with reservation to the deserving candidate should be encouraged  in premium institutes, so that  these aspirants can get quality education and  can improve their standard of living. Apart from this, Subsidized  medical treatment should be provided  to people so that the standard of life can be improved.
To conclude,  the disparity between the wealthy and needy is increasing, but this can be controlled or minimized , if the ministry uses the political will power to address these issues.
